field.label: Round Prices
field.comment: Note: rounding does not work if the tax is added to the prices in the admin panel.

field.label: Round Base Currency Prices
field.comment: If enabled, base currency prices will be rounded too.

field.label: Round Step (X)
field.comment: Recommended to use for stores with only 2 currencies.

field.label: Ceil Step (X)
field.comment: Recommended to use for stores with only 2 currencies.

field.label: Floor Step (X)
field.comment: Recommended to use for stores with only 2 currencies.

field.label: User Agents
field.comment: Enter User Agents for which extension should be disabled.
